title: Self-Cognitive Health Analysis for the Elderly: Data-Driven Project-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Application of mathematical modeling to elderly health management through analysis of actual health datasets.

learning_goals: Learners can build a senior health status classification system using a machine learning model (XGBoost).
Learners can quantitatively evaluate the importance of factors influencing health awareness through SHAP value analysis.
Learners can interpret nonlinear relationships between symptom intensity and health awareness using data visualization tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
